# Support

## How to get help

1. Use a GitHub issue with the `Support request` template.
2. Include:
   - Module path
   - Endpoint/use case
   - Exact command and output
   - Branch/commit SHA

## Before opening support issues

- Check existing issues and recent pull requests.
- Run `./gradlew check` locally.
- Confirm Java 23 is active for this repository.

## Security issues

Use private Security Advisories only:
https://github.com/COPUR/enterprise-loan-management-system/security/advisories/new
